name: Szachista
overview: Szachista is an adaptation of classic Chess game for up to two players (human or computer). The game allows to set a few additional visual options presented in adjustable windows, such as a list of defeated pawns, real-time movement analysis or turn clock. The player may use hints, undo last move, select of of three available difficulty levels. The database of the game includes most of the known Chess tactics showing the name of the recognized ones. The game has a built-in tutorial explaining all Chess rules and allowing to practice prepared tasks.
